answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
The Waters Consulting Group, Inc. (WCG) recently conducted a Total Compensation Review for the City of Greenville, NC and the Greenville Utilities Commission.  Attached is the presentation given to a joint meeting of their governing bodies.   It includes a discussion of a compensation philosophy as well as the comparison of compensation to private and public sector.  
For more information please contact Ruth Ann Eledge at raeledge@watersconsulting.com or (512) 447-8766.

author: Katie Killen
text: Has anyone recently put together a comprehensive compensation and benefit presentation for their Governing Body that compares the total package with private and governmental sectors? Additionally, we are interested in facilitating a discussion with our Governing Body regarding philosophy and strategy for a compensation and benefit package. If you have, do you have a presentation that you could share and the name of a consultant that you might recommend that has both a private and public background to do this study and analysis?
title: Comprehensive Compensation and Benefit Study and Strategy Study
